title: AtomicGuard Workflow Definition
description: Formal workflow specification aligned with Definition 9 (Workflow Orchestration)

specification.description: Ψ - Specification source reference (external to workflow)

model.description: Default LLM model identifier for generators

provider.description: LLM provider identifier for PydanticAI model selection

rmax.description: R_max - Maximum retry attempts per action pair (Definition 8)

glob.description: For folder type: glob pattern to select files (e.g., '**/*.md')

ActionPair.description: A = ⟨ρ, a_gen, G⟩ - Atomic generation-verification unit (Definition 6). The generator (a_gen) and guard (G) form a coupled transaction: generator produces artifacts, guard validates them.

generator.description: Generator type identifier (a_gen). Maps to GeneratorInterface implementation via entry points. If omitted, uses workflow-level default generator. Per Remark 5, generators may be autonomous Semantic Agents (e.g., ADDGenerator) that internally orchestrate multiple sub-steps.

guard.description: Guard type identifier (G). Built-in types: syntax, import, type, dynamic_test, human, composite. Custom guards use snake_case identifiers.

guards.description: For composite guards: ordered list of sub-guards (fail-fast)

requires.description: ρ - Precondition: action_pair_ids that must be satisfied (⊤) before execution

output_type.description: Expected artifact type (for structured output parsing)

human_prompt_title.description: Title for human review guard prompts
